Original.description: Indicates if the record is from the original dataset (Y) or if it was generated (N)

value_dict.Y: The record is from the original dataset

Sex.description: Gender of the individual (M for male, F for female)

Age.description: Age of the individual in years

Weight.description: Weight of the individual in kilograms

Height.description: Height of the individual in centimeters

Abdomen.description: Circumference of the abdomen in centimeters

Hip.description: Circumference of the hip in centimeters

Thigh.description: Circumference of the thigh in centimeters

Knee.description: Circumference of the knee in centimeters

Ankle.description: Circumference of the ankle in centimeters

Biceps.description: Circumference of the biceps in centimeters

Forearm.description: Circumference of the forearm in centimeters

Wrist.description: Circumference of the wrist in centimeters
